original_text: When King Hezekiah heard the report of his officers, he tore his clothes. Then he put on rough sackcloth and he went into the Lord's temple.
korean_text: 히스기야 왕이 듣고 자기의 옷을 찢고 굵은 베 옷을 입고 여호와의 전으로 갔고

sentences.original_text: When King Hezekiah heard the report of his officers
sentences.korean_translation: 히스기야 왕이 그의 신하들의 보고를 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: Then he put on rough sackcloth
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그는 거친 베옷을 입었다

sentences.original_text: and he went into the Lord's temple
